release.action: Repair major showstopper in Excalibur Component Manager. This showstopper manifests itself as a NullPointerException with ExcaliburComponentSelectors. Because of the reflective code in the ComponentFactory, this was originally missed in the Beta 2 release.
Updated Component Package to be Initializable, so that all components can be initialized once it is ready.
Fixed issues introduced with removing "throws Exception" from Disposable.
Made connections expire after 15 uses. This avoids problems with buggy client code or buggy drivers from causing serious issues in the long run.
Made Component Manager fixes to use the Thread's context classloader.
